anya-e0103n2:1_8: aññaṁ apatthetvā yathāladdhehi itarītarehi paccayehi paritussanā.
anya-e0103n2:1_12: Te guṇeti te sīlavodānassa hetubhūte appicchatādiguṇe.
anya-e0103n2:1_14: Te hi sīlavisuddhiyā paṭiladdhamattā hutvā dhutadhammehi sampannatarā honti.
anya-e0103n2:1_15: Dhutaṅgasamādānanti kilesānaṁ dhunanakaaṅgānaṁ viddhaṁsanakāraṇānaṁ sammadeva ādānaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:1_19: Sallekho kilesānaṁ sammadeva likhanā chedanā tanukaraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:1_21: Apacayo yathā paṭipajjanato kilesā naṁ apacinanti na ācinanti,
anya-e0103n2:1_24: Subharatā yathāvuttaappicchabhāvādisiddhā upaṭṭhakānaṁ sukhabharaṇīyatā suposatā. Ādi-
anya-e0103n2:1_26: Sīlañceva yathāsamādinnaṁ paṭipakkhadhammānaṁ dūrībhāvena suparisuddhaṁ bhavissati.
anya-e0103n2:1_27: Vatāni ca dhutadhammā ca sampajjissanti sampannā bhavissanti,
anya-e0103n2:1_29: Yā thirabhūtā itarītaracīvarapiṇḍapātasenāsanasantuṭṭhi porāṇānaṁ buddhādīnaṁ ariyānaṁ paveṇibhāvena ṭhitā,
anya-e0103n2:3_6: saddo gatiatthoti āha “kucchitabhāvaṁ gacchatīti vuttaṁ hotī”ti,
anya-e0103n2:3_7: paṁsu viya kucchitaṁ ulati pavattatīti vā paṁsukūlaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:3_11: Aṅgati attano phalaṁ paṭicca hetubhāvaṁ gacchatīti aṅgaṁ, kāraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:3_13: so samādānacetanāsaṅkhāto dhammo paṁsukūlikassa aṅganti paṁsukūlikaṅgaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:4_7: na kaṇḍupaṭicchādivassikasāṭikādīsūti tāni sarūpato dassento “saṅghāṭiuttarāsaṅgaantaravāsakasaṅkhāta”nti āha.
anya-e0103n2:5_0: Taṁ piṇḍapātanti parehi diyyamānānaṁ piṇḍānaṁ patte patanasaṅkhātaṁ piṇḍapātaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:5_10: tañca dassetuṁ “avakhaṇḍanarahitaṁ anugharanti vuttaṁ hotī”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:5_14: kāro ca luttaniddiṭṭhoti dassento “kevalaṁ ekasmiṁyeva patte”ti āha.
anya-e0103n2:5_15: Uttarapadalopaṁ katvā ayaṁ niddesoti dassento “pattapiṇḍagahaṇe pattapiṇḍasaññaṁ katvā”ti āha.
anya-e0103n2:6_0: Pacchābhattaṁ nāma pavāraṇato pacchā laddhabhattaṁ eva. Khalu-
anya-e0103n2:6_5: so eva samādānassa visayoti āha “samādānavasena paṭikkhittātirittabhojanassā”ti.
anya-e0103n2:6_8: taṁ sīlaṁ assātiādinā sabbaṁ vattabbanti āha “eseva nayo”ti.
anya-e0103n2:6_11: Taṁ hesa “idaṁ bahumaṅkuṇaṁ duggandhapavāta”ntiādivasena appaṭikkhipitvāva sampaṭicchati.
anya-e0103n2:6_14: Tena tena samādānenāti tena tena paṁsukūlikaṅgādikassa samādānena dhutakilesattāti viddhaṁsitakilesattā,
anya-e0103n2:6_17: tāniyeva idha dhutassa bhikkhuno aṅgānīti adhippetāni,
anya-e0103n2:6_19: aññena vā dhutassāti ayamattho atthato āpanno.
anya-e0103n2:6_20: “Ñāṇaṁ aṅgaṁ etesa”nti iminā ñāṇapubbakataṁ tesaṁ samādānassa vibhāveti.
anya-e0103n2:9_0: Samādānacetanāya gahaṇaṁ taṁmūlakattā pariharaṇacetanāpi dhutaṅgameva. Attanā,
anya-e0103n2:9_1: parammukhena ca kusalabhaṇḍassa bhusaṁ viluppanaṭṭhena loluppaṁ taṇhācāro,
anya-e0103n2:10_0: Bhagavatova santike samādātabbānīti idaṁ antarā avicchedanatthaṁ vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:10_1: rañño santike paṭiññātārahassa atthassa tadupajīvino ekaṁsato avisaṁvādanaṁ viya.
anya-e0103n2:10_4: Aṭṭhakathācariyassāti yassa aṭṭhakathātantiyeva visesato paguṇā, tassa.
anya-e0103n2:10_6: Jeṭṭhakabhātu dhutaṅgappicchatāya vatthūti so kira thero nesajjiko,
anya-e0103n2:10_8: Athekadivasaṁ rattiyā sayanapiṭṭhe nisinnaṁ vijjulatobhāsena disvā itaro pucchi “kiṁ, bhante,
anya-e0103n2:10_10: Thero dhutaṅgappicchatāya tāvadeva nipajjitvā pacchā samādiyīti evamāgataṁ vatthu.
anya-e0103n2:12_0: 24.Gahapatidānacīvaranti ettha dāyakabhāvena samaṇāpi ukkaṭṭhassa gahapatipakkhaṁyeva paviṭṭhāti daṭṭhabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:12_2: na pana gahapatidānacīvaranti tādisaṁ nivattetuṁ dānaggahaṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:12_3: Aññatarenāti ettha samādānavacanena tāva samādinnaṁ hotu,
anya-e0103n2:12_6: Yathā “devadatto divā na bhuñjatī”ti vutte “rattiyaṁ bhuñjatī”ti atthato āpannameva hoti,
anya-e0103n2:12_8: evamidhāpi bhikkhuno gahapatidānacīvare paṭikkhitte tadaññacīvarappaṭiggaho atthato āpanno eva hoti,
anya-e0103n2:13_2: Taṁ pana yasmā tattha kenaci chaḍḍitattā patitaṁ hoti,
anya-e0103n2:13_11: Vātāhatampi sāmikānaṁ satisammosena patitasadisanti “sāmike apassantena gahetuṁ vaṭṭatī”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:14_1: coḷakabhikkhāvasena laddhañca laddhakālato paṭṭhāya “samaṇacīvaraṁ siyā nu kho,
anya-e0103n2:14_2: no”ti āsaṅkaṁ nivattetuṁ “na taṁ paṁsukūla”nti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:14_3: Na hi taṁ tevīsatiyā uppattiṭṭhānesu katthaci pariyāpannaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:14_4: Idāni imināva pasaṅgena yaṁ bhikkhudattiye lakkhaṇapattaṁ paṁsukūlaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:14_6: Tattha gāhetvā vā dīyatīti saṅghassa vā gaṇassa vā dentehi yaṁ cīvaraṁ vassaggena pāpetvā bhikkhūnaṁ dīyati.
anya-e0103n2:14_7: Senāsanacīvaranti senāsanaṁ kāretvā “etasmiṁ senāsane vasantā paribhuñjantū”ti dinnacīvaraṁ.
anya-e0103n2:14_8: Na taṁ paṁsukūlanti apaṁsukūlabhāvo pubbe vuttakāraṇato,
anya-e0103n2:14_11: Tatrapīti yaṁ gāhetvā na dinnaṁ bhikkhudattiyaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:14_14: dāne ca visuṁ visuṁ ubhayattha ādaragāravānaṁ sabbhāvato,
anya-e0103n2:14_15: tadabhāvato ca bhikkhudattiyassa ekatosuddhi ubhatosuddhi anukkaṭṭhatā hontīti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ “yaṁ dāyakehī”tiādi vuttaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:15_0: Nissayānurūpapaṭipattisabbhāvoti upasampannasamanantaraṁ ācariyena vuttesu catūsu nissayesu attanā yathāpaṭiññātadutiyanissayānurūpāya
anya-e0103n2:15_6: Dhutadhamme samādāya vattanaṁ yāvadeva upari sammāpaṭipattisampādanāyāti vuttaṁ “sammāpaṭipattiyā anubrūhana”nti.
anya-e0103n2:15_13: tasmā ko taṁ na dhārayeti yojanā yaṁtaṁsaddānaṁ ekantasambandhibhāvato.
anya-e0103n2:15_14: Paṭiññaṁ samanussaranti upasampadamāḷe “āma bhante”ti ācariyapamukhassa saṅghassa sammukhā dinnaṁ paṭiññaṁ samanussaranto.
anya-e0103n2:18_13: parassa vā santakaṁ senāsane paccattharaṇavasena adhiṭṭhitaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:18_16: aṁsakāsāvanti imāni dvepi atirekacīvaraṭṭhāne ṭhitānipi dhutaṅgabhedaṁ na karontī”ti aṭṭhakathāyaṁ vuttanti vadanti.
anya-e0103n2:18_17: Pariharituṁ pana na vaṭṭatīti rajanakāle eva anuññātattā niccaparibhogavasena na vaṭṭati tecīvarikassa.
anya-e0103n2:18_23: parikkhāracoḷavasena ca bahūsu cīvaresu anuññātesupi ticīvaramatte ṭhitattā.
anya-e0103n2:21_15: Vihāre pakkabhattampīti upāsakā idheva bhattaṁ pacitvā “sabbesaṁ ayyānaṁ dassāmā”ti vihāreyeva bhattaṁ sampādenti,
anya-e0103n2:21_20: vihāreyeva bhikkhā ānīyatī”ti vadantānaṁ sampaṭicchanena taṁ divasaṁ nisīditvā.
anya-e0103n2:22_2: Niccaṁ antaragharaṁ pavisantasseva suppaṭicchannagamanādayo sekhiyadhammā sampajjantīti sekhiyapaṭipattipūraṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:23_2: Attabharassāti appānavajjasulabharūpehi paccayehi attano bharaṇato attabharassa.
anya-e0103n2:23_3: Tato eva ekavihāritāya saddhivihārikādīnampi aññesaṁ aposanato anaññaposino.
anya-e0103n2:23_4: Padadvayenāpi kāyaparihārikena cīvarena kucchiparihārikena piṇḍapātena vicaraṇato sallahukavuttitaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:23_8: Devāpi pihayanti tādinoti tādisassa bhusaṁ ativiya santakāyavacīmanokammatāya upasantassa paramena satinepakkena
anya-e0103n2:23_9: samannāgamato sabbakālaṁ satimato piṇḍapātikassa bhikkhussa sakkādayo devāpi pihayanti patthenti.
anya-e0103n2:23_10: Tassa sīlādiguṇesu bahumānaṁ uppādentā ādaraṁ janenti,
anya-e0103n2:26_3: Puratoti vīthiyaṁ gacchantassa purato gharaṁ apaviṭṭhasseva.
anya-e0103n2:26_4: Pattavissaṭṭhaṭṭhānanti pesakāravīthiyaṁ pesakārabhāvaṁ nimminitvā ṭhitassa sakkassa gharadvāre pattavissaṭṭhaṭṭhānaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:26_5: Ukkaṭṭhapiṇḍapātiko taṁ divasaṁ na bhikkhaṁ āgamayamāno nisīdati,
anya-e0103n2:26_7: Katthacipi kule nibaddhaṁ upasaṅkamanābhāvato paricayābhāvena kulesu niccanavakatā.
anya-e0103n2:26_8: Sabbattha alaggamānasatāya ca sommabhāvena ca candūpamatā.
anya-e0103n2:29_1: ekanisajjāya eva abhuñjitvā visuṁ visuṁ nisajjāsu āhāraparibhoganti attho.
anya-e0103n2:29_3: Vattaṁ kātuṁ vaṭṭatīti vattaṁ kātuṁ yujjati.
anya-e0103n2:29_5: Tattha pana paṭipajjanavidhiṁ dassetuṁ yaṁ theravādaṁ āha “āsanaṁ vā rakkheyya bhojanaṁ vā”tiādi.
anya-e0103n2:29_7: ekāsanikaṁ bhikkhuṁ bhuñjantaṁ āsanaṁ vā rakkheyya,
anya-e0103n2:29_8: dhutaṅgabhedato yāva bhojanapariyosānā na vuṭṭhātabbanti vuttaṁ hoti.
anya-e0103n2:29_13: tasmā vattakaraṇaṁ dhutaṅgaṁ na rakkhatīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:32_0: 29.Appaṭikūlaṁkatvā bhuñjituṁ vaṭṭati paṭikūlassa bhuttassa agaṇhanampi siyāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:32_1: Pamāṇayuttameva gaṇhitabbanti “ekabhājanameva gaṇhāmī”ti bahuṁ gahetvā na chaḍḍetabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:32_3: Atra atra nānābhājane ṭhite nānārase icchā etassāti atriccho,
anya-e0103n2:32_6: Āhāre payojanamattadassitāti asambhinnanānārase gedhaṁ akatvā āhāre satthārā anuññātapayojanamattadassitā.
anya-e0103n2:32_7: Visuṁ visuṁ bhājanesu ṭhitāni byañjanāni gaṇhato tattha tattha sābhogatāya siyā vikkhittabhojitā,
anya-e0103n2:35_2: tassa paṭikkhepena taṁ atirittaṁ bhojananti atirittabhojanaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:35_3: Puna bhojanaṁ kappiyaṁ kāretvā na bhuñjitabbaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:35_13: Puna pariyesanavasena pariyesanāya khedaṁ na yāti.
anya-e0103n2:38_1: araññañca sarūpato dassetuṁ “tattha saddhiṁ upacārenā”tiādi āraddhaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:38_3: Yo koci satthopi gāmo nāmāti sambandho.
anya-e0103n2:38_7: Tattha hi “gāmā vā araññā vā”ti anavasesato avahāraṭṭhānapariggahe tadubhayaṁ asaṅkarato dassetuṁ “ṭhapetvā gāmañcā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:38_9: Nippariyāyato pana gāmavinimuttaṁ ṭhānaṁ araññameva hotīti abhidhamme gāmā “nikkhamitvā bahi indakhīlā,
anya-e0103n2:38_11: Suttantikapariyāyena āraññakasikkhāpade “pañcadhanusatikaṁ pacchima”nti āgataṁ āraññikaṁ bhikkhuṁ sandhāya.
anya-e0103n2:38_12: Na hi so vinayapariyāyike “araññe vasanato āraññiko pantasenāsano”ti sutte vutto.
anya-e0103n2:38_13: Ayañca suttasaṁvaṇṇanāti idha sabbattha suttantakathāva pamāṇaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:38_14: Tasmā tattha āgatameva lakkhaṇaṁ gahetabbanti dassento “taṁ āropitena ācariyadhanunā”tiādinā minanavidhiṁ āha.
anya-e0103n2:38_15: Teneva hi majjhimaṭṭhakathānayova idamettha pamāṇanti ca vutto.
anya-e0103n2:39_0: Tato tato magganti tattha tattha khuddakamaggaṁ pidahati.
anya-e0103n2:39_6: Nipajjitvā gamissāmāti cittassa sithilabhāvena dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjatīti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:39_10: Assa āraññikassa cittaṁ na vikkhipanti āpāthamanupagamanato.
anya-e0103n2:39_12: Jīvitanikantiṁ jahati bahuparissaye araññe nivāseneva maraṇabhayassa dūrīkaraṇato.
anya-e0103n2:39_15: Yathānusiṭṭhaṁ paṭipattiyā vivekassa adhiṭṭhānabhāvato āraññikaṅgayogino vāhanasadisanti katvā vuttaṁ “avasesadhutāyudho”ti,
anya-e0103n2:42_3: Tattha hi tesaṁ rājūnaṁ balakāyo upagantvā antarantarā yuddhaṁ kareyya,
anya-e0103n2:42_4: corāpi pāripanthikā samosarantā bhikkhussa sukhena nisīdituṁ na denti.
anya-e0103n2:42_5: Cetiyarukkho “devatādhiṭṭhito”ti manussehi sammatarukkho pūjetuṁ upagatehi manussehi avivitto hoti.
anya-e0103n2:43_1: tarūnaṁ vā paṇṇesu vikārassa khaṇabhaṅgassa dassanena.
anya-e0103n2:43_4: Tāpi hi rukkhaṭṭhavimānesu vasantiyo rukkhesu vasanti.
anya-e0103n2:43_7: “Rukkhamūlasenāsanaṁ nissāya pabbajjā”ti evaṁ nissayoti ca bhāsito.
anya-e0103n2:43_12: Evaṁ passanto tarupaṇṇāni paccakkhato eva niccasaññaṁ panūdati pajahati,
anya-e0103n2:46_1: “Rukkhamūlaṁ paṭikkhipāmī”ti ettake vutte channaṁ appaṭikkhittameva hotīti “channañcarukkhamūlañca paṭikkhipāmī”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:46_2: Dhutaṅgassa sabbaso paṭiyogipaṭikkhepena hi samādānaṁ ijjhati,
anya-e0103n2:46_4: “Dhammassavanāyā”ti imināva dhammaṁ kathentenāpi uposathadivasādīsu suṇantānaṁ cittānurakkhaṇatthaṁ tehi yācitena channaṁ pavisituṁ vaṭṭati,
anya-e0103n2:46_10: Maggamajjhe ṭhitaṁ sālanti sīhaḷadīpe viya maggā anokkamma ujukameva pavisitabbasālaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:47_2: Acchannamariyādanti yathā vassodakaṁ anto na pavisati,
anya-e0103n2:47_4: Anto pana pabbhārassa vassodakaṁ pavisati ce,
anya-e0103n2:48_0: Paviṭṭhakkhaṇe dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjati yathāvuttapabbhārādike ṭhapetvāti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:48_1: Jānitvāti dhammassavanādiatthaṁ channaṁ rukkhamūlaṁ pavisitvā nisinno “idāni aruṇo uṭṭhahatī”ti jānitvā.
anya-e0103n2:48_2: Rukkhamūlepi katthaci attheva nivāsaphāsukatāti siyā tattha āsaṅgapubbako āvāsapalibodho,
anya-e0103n2:48_3: na pana abbhokāseti idheva āvāsapalibodhupacchedo ānisaṁso vutto.
anya-e0103n2:48_7: tasmā tattha gantuṁ neva sakkāti edisassa parivitakkassa abhāvato cātuddiso.
anya-e0103n2:51_3: Na tatthāti “susāna”nti vavatthapitamatte ṭhāne na vasitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:52_0: Sosānikena nāma appakiccena sallahukavuttinā bhavitabbanti dassetuṁ “tasmiṁ pana vasantenā”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:52_3: Tattha uppannaparissayavighātatthāyāti “susānaṁ nāma manussarāhasseyyaka”nti corā katakammāpi akatakammāpi osaranti,
anya-e0103n2:52_4: tattha coresu bhaṇḍasāmike disvā bhikkhusamīpe bhaṇḍaṁ chaḍḍetvā palātesu manussā bhikkhuṁ “coro”ti gahetvā potheyyuṁ,
anya-e0103n2:52_5: tasmā vihāre saṅghattheraṁ vā gocaragāme raññā niyuttaṁ rājayuttakaṁ vā attano sosānikabhāvaṁ jānāpetvā yathā tādiso,
anya-e0103n2:52_8: Caṅkamantassa yadā āḷahanaṁ abhimukhaṁ na hoti,
anya-e0103n2:52_9: tadāpi saṁvegajananatthaṁ tattha diṭṭhi vissajjetabbāti dassetuṁ “addhakkhikena āḷahanaṁ olokentenā”ti vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:53_5: Kenaci leḍḍupāsāṇādinā āsanne vicarantīti na paharitabbā.
anya-e0103n2:53_11: pisācānubandhattā ca kulagehassa abbhantaraṁ na pavisitabbaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:53_13: Matañātakānaṁ tattha gantvā devasikaṁ rodanaṁ dhuvarodanaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:54_10: Saṁviggassa yoniso padahanaṁ sambhavatīti amanussānaṁ garubhāvanīyatā.
anya-e0103n2:57_6: Vihārassa pariyantabhāvena dūreti vā bahūnaṁ sannipātaṭṭhānādīnaṁ accāsanneti vā pucchituṁ na labhati,
anya-e0103n2:57_9: Sacassa taṁ na ruccatīti assa yathāsanthatikassa taṁ yathāgāhitaṁ senāsanaṁ aphāsukabhāvena sace na ruccati,
anya-e0103n2:57_10: mudukassa asati roge yathāgāhitaṁ pahāya aññassa senāsanassa gahaṇaṁ loluppaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:61_1: Tappaṭikkhepeneva hi tadatthā “mañco bhisī”ti evamādikā seyyā paṭikkhittā eva honti.
anya-e0103n2:61_2: “Nesajjiko”ti ca sayanaṁ paṭikkhipitvā nisajjāya eva viharituṁ sīlamassāti imassa atthassa idha adhippetattā seyyā evettha paṭiyoginī,
anya-e0103n2:61_5: Kosajjapakkhiyo hi iriyāpatho idha paṭiyogibhāvena icchito, na itare.
anya-e0103n2:61_6: Na ca sakkā ṭhānagamanehi vinā nisajjāya eva yāpetuṁ tathā pavattetunti seyyāvettha paṭiyoginī.
anya-e0103n2:62_1: piṭṭhiapassayo cāti imehi pañcahi aṅgehi pañcaṅgo.
anya-e0103n2:62_4: Ubhosu passesu piṭṭhipasse ca yathāsukhaṁ apassāya viharato nesajjikassa “anesajjikato ko viseso”ti gāhaṁ
anya-e0103n2:62_5: nivāretuṁ abhayatthero nidassito “thero anāgāmī hutvā parinibbāyī”ti.
anya-e0103n2:63_0: Upacchedīyati etenāti upacchedananti vinibandhupacchedassa sādhakatamabhāvo daṭṭhabbo.
anya-e0103n2:66_5: Akusalampi dhutaṅganti akusalacittenāpi dhutaṅgasevanā atthīti adhippāyo.
anya-e0103n2:66_8: taṁ dhutaṅgaṁ nāma na hoti. Kasmā?
anya-e0103n2:66_10: Yaṁ hidaṁ kilesānaṁ dhunanato dhutassa puggalassa, ñāṇassa,
anya-e0103n2:66_14: āraññikaṅgādīni pana na hontīti imamatthaṁ dassetuṁ “na maya”ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:66_17: Na ca akusalena koci dhuto nāma hoti,
anya-e0103n2:66_20: etena paṭhamenāpi atthavikappena “natthi akusalaṁ dhutaṅga”nti dasseti.
anya-e0103n2:66_21: Na ca akusalaṁ kiñci dhunātīti akusalaṁ kiñci pāpaṁ na ca dhunāti eva appaṭipakkhato.
anya-e0103n2:66_22: Yesaṁ samādānānaṁ taṁ akusalaṁ ñāṇaṁ viya aṅganti katvā tāni dhutaṅgānīti vucceyyuṁ.
anya-e0103n2:66_23: Iminā dutiyenāpi atthavikappena “natthi akusalaṁ dhutaṅga”nti dasseti.
anya-e0103n2:67_1: Te hi dhutaṅgaṁ nāma paññattīti vadanti.
anya-e0103n2:67_2: Tathā sati tassa paramatthato avijjamānattā kilesānaṁ dhunanaṭṭhopi na siyā,
anya-e0103n2:67_3: samādātabbatā cāti tesaṁ vacanaṁ pāḷiyā virujjhatīti dassetuṁ “kusalattikavinimutta”ntiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:67_4: Tasmāti yasmā paññattipakkhe ete dosā dunnivārā,
anya-e0103n2:67_5: tasmā taṁ tesaṁ vacanaṁ na gahetabbaṁ,
anya-e0103n2:67_13: siyā asaṁkiliṭṭhasaṁkilesikāti evaṁ sesatikadukapadehipi nesaṁ yathārahaṁ saṅgaho vibhāvetabbo.
anya-e0103n2:68_1: idha pana dhutaṅgasevanāmukhena kilese vidhunitvā ṭhito khīṇāsavo “dhutakileso puggalo”ti adhippeto.
anya-e0103n2:68_2: Tathā sabbopi ariyamaggo nippariyāyena kilesadhunano dhammo,
anya-e0103n2:68_6: Evaṁ dhutaṁ dassetvā dhutavāde dassetabbe yasmā dhutavādabhedena dhuto viya dhutabhedena dhutavādopi duvidho,
anya-e0103n2:68_8: tadubhayapaṭikkhepassa ca vasena catukkamettha sambhavatīti taṁ dassetuṁ “atthi dhuto”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:69_2: Dhutadhammā nāmāti dhutaṅgasevanāya paṭipakkhabhūtānaṁ pāpadhammānaṁ dhunanavasena pavattiyā “dhuto”ti
anya-e0103n2:69_3: laddhanāmāya dhutaṅgacetanāya upakārakā dhammāti katvā dhutadhammā nāma.
anya-e0103n2:69_4: Asampattasampattesu paccayesu alubbhanākārena pavattanato appicchatā santuṭṭhitā ca atthato alobho.
anya-e0103n2:69_5: Paccayagedhādihetukānaṁ lolatādīnaṁ saṁkilesānaṁ sammadeva likhanato chedanato gaṇasaṅgaṇikādibhedato
anya-e0103n2:69_6: saṁsaggato cittassa vivecanato sallekhatā pavivekatā ca alobho amohoti imesu dvīsu dhammesu anupatanti
anya-e0103n2:69_10: yena ñāṇena pabbajitena nāma paṁsukūlikaṅgādīsu patiṭṭhitena bhavitabbanti yathānusiṭṭhaṁ dhutaguṇe samādiyati ceva pariharati ca,
anya-e0103n2:69_13: Paṭikkhepavatthūsūti gahapaticīvarādīsu tehi tehi dhutaṅgehi paṭikkhipitabbavatthūsu.
anya-e0103n2:70_0: Sukhumakaraṇasannissayo rāgo dukkhāya paṭipattiyā patiṭṭhaṁ na labhatīti āha “dukkhāpaṭipadañca nissāya rāgo vūpasammatī”ti.
anya-e0103n2:70_2: satisampajaññe moho apatiṭṭhova appamādasambhavatoti vuttaṁ “sallekhaṁ nissāya appamattassa moho pahīyatī”ti.
anya-e0103n2:72_0: Terasāpi dhutaṅgāni samādāya pariharantānaṁ puggalānaṁ vasena “dvācattālīsa hontī”ti vatvā bhikkhūnaṁ
anya-e0103n2:72_1: terasannampi pariharaṇassa ekajjhaṁyeva sambhavaṁ dassetuṁ “sace hī”tiādi vuttaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:72_5: rukkhamūlikaṅgaṁ samādiyāmī”ti vacanato channe aruṇaṁ uṭṭhāpitamatte dhutaṅgaṁ bhijjati,
anya-e0103n2:72_11: Pavāritāya hi bhikkhuniyā atirittaṁ katvā bhuñjituṁ na labbhati.
anya-e0103n2:72_15: Aṭṭheva honti bhikkhuniyā saṁkaccikacīvarādīhi saddhiṁ pañcapi ticīvarasaṅkhameva gacchantīti katvā.
anya-e0103n2:72_16: Yathāvuttesūti bhikkhūnaṁ vuttesu terasasu ticīvarādhiṭṭhānavinayakammābhāvato ṭhapetvā tecīvarikaṅgaṁ dvādasa sāmaṇerānaṁ.
anya-e0103n2:72_17: Sattāti bhikkhunīnaṁ vuttesu aṭṭhasu ekaṁ pahāya satta ticīvarādhiṭṭhānavinayakammābhāvato.
anya-e0103n2:72_18: “Ṭhapetvā tecīvarikaṅga”nti hi imaṁ anuvattamānameva katvā “satta sikkhamānasāmaṇerīna”nti vuttaṁ.
